itunes:title: Esports (with Manalu Nakanishi)
title: Esports (with Manalu Nakanishi)
description:
Professional esports athlete and college student Manalu Nakanishi introduces Ron to the bursting popularity of competitive gaming, and how the UH-Mānoa esports team is attracting national attention.
